name: Capacitor's Revenge (Amiga Blitz Basic Game Jam)
name_original: Capacitor's Revenge (Amiga Blitz Basic Game Jam)
description:
This is an Amiga Disk File (.ADF) and requires a real Amiga computer to run or an Amiga emulator!

This is an "in development" version of my game and is not the final version I am submitting to the game jam.
